ERROR_CODES.AE_000: An unexpected authentication error occurred. Please try again later.
ERROR_CODES.AE_001: This email address is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique email.
ERROR_CODES.AE_002: The provided email is invalid. Please enter a valid email address.
ERROR_CODES.AE_003: No user found with this identifier. Please check your information.
ERROR_CODES.AE_004: This email is already in use. Please use a different email address.
ERROR_CODES.AE_005: Incorrect password. Please verify and try again.
ERROR_CODES.AE_006: The provided password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters long.
ERROR_CODES.AE_007: This operation requires recent authentication. Please log in again.
ERROR_CODES.AE_008: The provided password is invalid. It must be a string with at least six characters.
ERROR_CODES.AE_009: This user account has been disabled. Please contact support.
ERROR_CODES.AE_010: An account already exists with the same email but different credentials.
ERROR_CODES.AE_011: The provided user ID is already in use. Each user must have a unique ID.
ERROR_CODES.AE_012: The provided phone number is already in use by an existing user.
ERROR_CODES.AE_013: The provided credentials are invalid or have expired.
ERROR_CODES.AE_014: The verification code provided is invalid. Please request a new code.
ERROR_CODES.AE_015: The action code has expired. Please request a new link.
ERROR_CODES.AE_016: The provided Firebase ID token has expired.
ERROR_CODES.AE_017: The Firebase ID token has been revoked.
ERROR_CODES.AE_018: The provided ID token is not a valid Firebase ID token.
ERROR_CODES.AE_019: The Firebase session cookie has expired.
ERROR_CODES.AE_020: The Firebase session cookie has been revoked.
ERROR_CODES.AE_021: Insufficient permissions to access this authentication resource.
ERROR_CODES.AE_022: The domain of the continue URL is not whitelisted.
ERROR_CODES.AE_023: The operation is not allowed. Check your Firebase project configuration.
ERROR_CODES.AE_024: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
ERROR_CODES.AE_025: No Firebase project was found for the credentials used.
ERROR_CODES.AE_026: The claims payload provided is too large.
ERROR_CODES.AE_027: The custom claim attributes provided are invalid.
ERROR_CODES.AE_028: One or more custom claims are reserved for system use.
ERROR_CODES.AE_029: The hash algorithm must match one of the supported algorithms.
